a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Income share of the richest 1% before and after tax
The share of income received by the richest 1% of the population. Income is measured before and after taxes and
benefits. The latest available estimates are shown for each country.
Note: Before tax income is measured before payment of taxes and non-pension benefits, but after the payment of public and private
